title: Pixel launcher constantly crashes after installing December 2019 patch on pixel 2
content:
Pixel launcher constantly crashes after installing December 2019 patch on pixel 2, even after multiple reboots. 
I am unable to use my phone for at least 30 minutes.
Also, after 5 minutes of constant struggle I have managed to access phone storage on PC.
I even tried to kill pixel launcher using adb but getting error -
error: device '(null)' not found
I was then able to upload Screenshots using google assistant to open google photos, as I have set auto-backup on. Here is the link - https://photos.app.goo.gl/jm5ABtW92Y9xkfTL8
Kindly contact me ASAP. 
As I am locked out all my accounts due to two-factor authentications (except Google, thank god I had already login on my PC.)

Update 1 - Just now I have changed my default browser to Nigrara from Pixel Launcher, yet it's still crashing. I am not able to force stop as I can use any conformation window as new pop-up saying `Pixel Launcher keeps stopping` keeps on re-appearing on my phone as can be seen on screenshots.
